tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LegalCases (
 case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 case_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 case_description TEXT,
 case_date DATE,
 plaintiff_name VARCHAR(50),
 defendant_name VARCHAR(50),
 case_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE legal_cases (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    case_description TEXT,
    filing_date DATE,
    court_location VARCHAR(100),
    outcome VARCHAR(50),
    gender_discrimination BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE lawyers (
    lawyer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lawyer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    lawyer_specialization VARCHAR(100),
    lawyer_experience_years INT,
    lawyer_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE LegalCases (
 case_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 case_name VARCHAR(255),
 case_type VARCHAR(100),
 filed_date DATE,
 outcome VARCHAR(50),
 )

CREATE TABLE PartiesInvolved (
 party_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 party_name VARCHAR(255),
 party_type VARCHAR(100),
 party_role VARCHAR(100),
 )

CREATE TABLE CaseDocuments (
 document_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 document_name VARCHAR(255),
 document_type VARCHAR(100),
 document_date DATE,
 )

CREATE TABLE LegalCases (
 case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_title TEXT,
 filing_date DATE,
 outcome TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Plaintiffs (
 plaintiff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 plaintiff_name TEXT,
 gender TEXT,
 age INT
)

CREATE TABLE Defendants (
 defendant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 defendant_name TEXT,
 gender TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Lawyers (
 lawyer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 lawyer_name TEXT,
 specialization TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE legal_cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255),
  case_description TEXT,
  filing_date DATE,
  outcome VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE plaintiffs (
  plaintiff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plaintiff_name VARCHAR(255),
  plaintiff_gender VARCHAR(10),
  plaintiff_age INT,
  case_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES legal_cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE defendants (
  defendant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  defendant_name VARCHAR(255),
  defendant_gender VARCHAR(10),
  defendant_role VARCHAR(50),
  case_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES legal_cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE lawyers (
  lawyer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lawyer_name VARCHAR(255),
  specialization VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE court_sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  judge_name VARCHAR(255),
  case_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES legal_cases(case_id)
)
